# Draft:ENCY Software

----
ENCY Software develops computer-aided manufacturing (CAM) and off-line programming tools used in CNC machining and industrial robotics. The software integrates toolpath generation with robotic simulation and off-line programming functions. The companyâ€™s market introduction in 2024 was noted by regional European media. In 2025 the company released software updates and announced a partnership with a Danish research center.
